channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20944] Not validate stats during query compilation
item.description: In a discussion with ashutoshc, we find currently query planning only use valid stats. If the stats are outdated, Hive will not get any stats. Hive shall use whatever we can find in metastore. It does not need to be up to date during query planning.
item.summary: Not validate stats during query compilation

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
